import React, { useState } from "react"; import GetAllDevicesIP from "./Tools/GetAllDevicesIP"; import "../styles/Tools.css"; export default function Tools(ac) { const handleIPs = () => { let row = []; ac.dc.clientList.map((item) => { var rowModel = [ { Description: item.name, Model: item.model, LAN_IP_address: item.lanIp, MAC_address: item.mac, WAN_1_IP: item.wan1Ip, WAN_2_IP: item.wan2Ip, Serial: item.serial, }, ]; row.push(...rowModel); ac.dc.setmapRows(row); }); }; return (
